definition: a human female employed to do housework
details:
noun
- a human female employed to do housework
= example: a human female employed to do housework
- women as a class
= example: women as a class
= synonyms: womanhood
- an adult female human
= example: an adult female human
= synonyms: adult female
- a female person who plays a significant role, such as a wife or mistress or girlfriend, in the life of a particular person
